attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD IF YOU LOVE YOUR PHONE
attributes.review:
Where to begin. 

This app is HORRIBLE. Downloaded fine on my iPhone, but once I opened the app, it made my phone barfü§Æ Yes, my phone THREW UP. It started showing me orange people with terrible haircuts and SPREADING LIES about how climate change isn‚Äôt realüò¶ i couldn‚Äôt believe my eyes, I immediately deleted it and now I have to buy a new phone. 

If you love your iPhone PLEASE do not get this app. It will RUIN your iPhone, and I‚Äôm pretty sure it signed me up for a subscription that I did not want. 

So do yourself the favor and do not get this app.

attributes.title: No no no nooo
attributes.review: This app crashed multiple times while trying to open. Do NOT download this app. It is a scam. There is no benefit in having this on your phone. It will take up large amounts of space, track your information, and crash.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE DONT BUY
attributes.review: this app looks like it was created by a child! makes sense because don is a child molester! made my phone crash multiple times and my phone got a mind of its own and started scrolling and switching through apps (perhaps it was taken over by an fbi agent :o) DONT DOWNLOAD!!

attributes.title: Spread of horrible messages and encouragement of violence
attributes.review: This app has been infested with so many instances of lies and hate speech that it is simply unusable and a saddening sight for the people of America. I believe this app should be taken down IMMEDIATELY, and removed from anywhere that it can be downloaded. I am VERY angry üò°ü§¨.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: Like others are saying in the reviews: I downloaded this app to get updates about the presidential campaign but it has COMPLETELY RUINED MY NEW IPHONE 11. My battery is drained. Every time I open the app it glitches and my whole phone crashes. Absolutely terrible.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Words cannot describe how awful this app is. Trump used my information to stalk my address and showed up at my house and drop kicked my grandma in the face. And he stole all the food in our fridge! Just because we‚Äôre black! How rude! I wish I could give this app zero starts.

attributes.title: Mad mad

This app stole my food my bed and my pet rat, bat and dolphin. And when I say that I‚Äôve never left SUCH A BAD review on a app I would not be lying. That‚Äôs all I have to say today.
